title: 519. Has Globalization Failed?
description: It was supposed to boost prosperity and democracy at the same time. What really happened? According to the legal scholar Anthea Roberts, it depends which story you believe.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
